      row - current Worker's row
      column - current Worker's column

      row - current Worker's row
      column - current Worker's column
      Returns:

    • getOpponentWorkers

      public java.util.List<Position> getOpponentWorkers​(Board board, int row, int column)
      Makes the list of Positions unmodifiable
      Parameters:
      board - current board state
      row - current Worker's row
      column - current Worker's column
      Returns:
      list of the Positions where are placed Opponent's workers

    • getActiveOpponentWorkers

      public java.util.List<Position> getActiveOpponentWorkers​(Board board, int row, int column)
      Finds all the Positions where are situated the Opponent's workers and where it is possible to build in
      Parameters:
      board - current board state
      row - current Worker's row
      column - current Worker's column
      Returns:
      list of the Positions where the Opponent's workers are situated, surrounded by at least one cell where building is possible

    • getOtherWorker

      public Position getOtherWorker​(Board board, int row, int column)
      Given a Player's worker, finds the other one
      Parameters:
      board - current board state
      row - current Worker's row
      column - current Worker's column
      Returns:
      Position where the other Worker of the same Player is situated
